attributes.action: allocate immediate and necessary funding for the proper provision of personal care through Social Services departments in the UK.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Are you a disabled or elderly person who has had their care provision cut through no fault of your own? Do you have to care for someone who's had their hours cut? Why should the disabled and elderly have to suffer because the government wants to save money? Please sign and help the people who really need the care to get what’s required!
